item.title: [PI] ::checkbank command is not working ingame [No errors when compiled] [PI]
item.dc:creator: @badboyzack10 badboyzack10
item.description:
@badboyzack10 wrote:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("checkbank")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); for(int i = 0; i < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; i++) { Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(args[1])) { c.getPA().otherBank(c, o); break; } } } }

item.title: [PI] ::checkbank command is not working ingame [No errors when compiled] [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mr_pker01 mr pker01
item.description:
@mr_pker01 wrote:

Hi, this is mr pker01. I Just followed the guide “[PI] ::checkbank [PI]” which will be found on moparscape tutorials server, but when i compiled there’s no errors. When i did ::checkbank (playername) ingame, it’s not working what will i do??

This is my command for ::checkbank

if (playerCommand.startsWith("checkbank")) { String[] args = playerCommand.split(" "); for(int q = 0; q < Config.MAX_PLAYERS; q++) { Client o = (Client) Server.playerHandler.players[i]; if(Server.playerHandler.players[i] != null) { if(Server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(args[1])) { c.getPA().otherBank(c, o); break; } } } }

[size=18pt]And one more thing lol, i have done ingame highscores and it’s working ingame now but it’s not update i mean, i only see my name on the list but there’s like 11 players online on my server i did relog and still see only my name :([/size]
